quote: Set your heart ablaze
Surpass your limits. Right here. Right now.
If you win, you live. If you lose, you die. If you don’t fight, you can’t win.
Because I was born into this world.
If there isn't one, then let's make a place for humans to live outside. Let's change the world.
The gap between the rich and the poor exists even among the gods.
I don't want to regret anything because of the way I have lived.
It's better to be hurt than to hurt others.
No matter what lies you tell, you can't fool your own heart.
The luminous blue stripes that ring our bodies are the ties that bind friends together in the world of flame and smoke. Never break them.
A life doing only what you want to do...it's nothing but a dream.
The world isn’t perfect. But it’s there for us, doing the best it can…that’s what makes it so damn beautiful.
You can die anytime, but living takes true courage.
Whatever you lose you will find it again. But what you throw away you will never get back.
If you don’t take risks, you can’t create a future.
We don’t have to know what tomorrow holds! That’s why we can live for everything we’re worth today.
You may be able to get stronger with simply the right attitude. In other words, train your spirit before worrying about strength through power and technology.
What I want is for the humans and the forest to live in peace.
Once you have met someone, you never really forget them. It just takes a while for your memories to return.
I finally get a bouquet and it’s a goodbye present. That’s depressing.
Dedicate your heart.
Give up on your dreams and die.
If a miracle only happens once, then what is it called the second time.
Arrogance destroys the footholds of victory.
A victor must speak not of the current state of the world, but of how it should rightfully be.
Man, kids these days. They think it’s a competition to have the most friends. One is enough. Find someone completely unique.
Even if things are painful and tough, people should appreciate what it means to be alive.
Life and death are like light and shadow. They’re both always there. But people don’t like thinking about death, so subconsciously, they always look away from it.
No matter how many people you may lose, you have no choice but to go on living.
The weak have no rights or choices. Their only fate is to be relentlessly crushed by the strong.
Remember, it’s the heart that drives people so it can grow as strong as you need it to.
Those who have baggage like conflict or quandaries are spineless fools. That's always been the story of my life.
Protect whatever is precious to you. One day it will lead you to protect something else.
Being weak is nothing to be ashamed of… Staying weak is.
My magic is never giving up.
I’ve been facing adversity from the day I was born! No matter how many of you there are, or what happens, I’ll overcome it all.
Even if you weren’t chosen, even if you weren’t wanted, even if you aren’t forgiven… You need to stand your ground no matter how pathetic you are.
Know your place, fool.
I want more good people to enjoy fairness, even if only a few.
Even when our eyes are closed, there’s a whole world out there that lives outside ourselves and our dreams.

In order to obtain something, there must be something of equal value. It is the law of conservation in alchemy. Back then, we believed that it was the truth of the world. However, the real world isn’t perfect, so there is not just a single law that governs everything that happens within it.
If you want to get to know someone, find out what makes them angry.
Humans aren’t made perfectly. Everyone lies. Even so… I’ve been careful not to tell lies that hurt others.
The human world is a boring place with boring people doing boring things.
